item.title: Can community awareness campaigns in low-resource areas improve early diagnosis of colorectal cancer?
item.description: In low-resource regions such as Nigeria, most people with colorectal cancer are diagnosed too late for curative treatment options.

item.title: After Canada legalized cannabis, police caught more drunk drivers
item.description: When Canada legalized cannabis in October 2018, there were many concerns about its potential impacts. One of them involved cannabis-impaired driving.
